results.title: [65-year-old man with yellow-orange papules on both forearms. Eruptive xanthomas].
results.text_hl: The @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ was treated with a low fat, sugar free diet, as well as @CHEMICAL_Bezafibrate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001629 @@@bezafibrate@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@. The @<m>DISEASE_Xanthomatosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014973 @@@xanthomas@@@ resolved over six months.

citations.NLM: Streit E, Helmbold P. [65-year-old man with yellow-orange papules on both forearms. Eruptive xanthomas]. Hautarzt. 2009 Oct;60(10):834-7. PMID: 19774351
